task.title: Switch Your Presence Status
task.shortdesc: You can log in the Extension User Portal to switch your presence status. The presence status will be displayed on Linkus client, and the corresponding call forwarding and ring strategy will work.

step.cmd: On the Extension User Portal, click the status icon at the right-upper corner to switch your presence status.

info.note: If the presence status is set to DND, you won't receive any calls.
